writer.name: C. Ray Stahl C. Ray Stahl

director.name: 乔治·P·布雷克斯顿 George P. Breakston

introduction: 日本疯狂科学家发明了片剂核弹，"Rocky" Wilson和美国空姐Peggy Barnes一起挫败阴谋A crazed scientist in Japan develops small explosive pills that are more powerful than nuclear weapons. He and his gang intend to seize control of the world with these pills, but they accidentally fall into the hands of two nutty American GIs. Soon the GIs are being chased by the scientist and his gang, and the Japanese secret police, who send a mysterious "menalist" to try to get the pills back.
